content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
No new structures have been successfully created on the map. Multiple attempts were made to locate, place, and craft a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for supplying Automation Science Packs, but none were completed due to resource and placement issues. Although furnaces were referenced for smelting operations—one at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0) for iron plate production and a copper furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0) for copper plate production—no composite structure was successfully constructed as a result of these actions.

ERROR TIPS
• API Call Errors
 – When using get_entities, ensure the function is invoked with the correct signature. Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments (such as “radius”) or providing extra positional arguments.
• Lab Placement and Inventory Checks
 – Verify that the Lab exists in the inventory before attempting placement. Confirm resource availability to avoid placement failures.
• Entity Retrieval Validation
 – Always check that the result from an entity-retrieval call is a valid, iterable collection rather than None before processing.
• Lab Crafting Resource Shortages
 – Monitor the production chain and ensure all required sub-ingredients (e.g. iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables) are available. Address any gaps in resource processing (such as insufficient smelted iron or copper plates) prior to retrying Lab crafting.
